attributes.action: do all he can to bring about the immediate release of Aung San Suu Kyi
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aung San Suu Kyi is the democratically elected leader of Burma. Despite overwhelmingly winning the General election in 1990 the country's military junta have never recognised the results and since 1990 Aung San Suu Kyi has spent over 11 years under house arrest. This is clearly unacceptable and the British Prime Minister should do all he can to bring about a swift resolution to ensure the release of this remarkable woman
